description:
The Anti-Ajin Special Forces start with the upper hand, but Sato turns the tide. Kei and his team head upstairs to make their final preparations.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: C`est vous qui bousillez ma vie !
Jama Shiteru no wa Anta no Hou Daro
To Ty nie dajesz mi żyć!
You`re the One Messing Up My Life!
邪魔してるのはあんたの方だろ
